ModMetaData.name: Rimworld Search Agency
ModMetaData.author: DoctorVanGogh, Killface, meonester
ModMetaData.description:
This Mod allows you to search by name in various filters:
+ Storage tab + Bill tab + Outfit tab
Original A12 version by meonester. Initial update for A17 by Killface. Mod menu, rewrites for Harmony and massive improvements by DoctorVanGogh
Includes Hauling Hysteresis by Vendan https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=26958.0
